products.title: Tiny Rainbows Sunrise Roman Blind
products.description: Light up your little ones space with this gorgeous little number. A bright white, softly textured fabric is adorned with cheerful little rainbows in complementary shades of blue, ochre, umber and mint green, for a joyously vibrant look. products.title: Cloud Burst Rainbow Roman Blind
products.description: Who knew the rain clouds could be bursting with such colour? This blind is the perfect touch for a child's bedroom or playroom, especially with the option of a blackout lining to chop out the glare and protect them from the sun. products.title: Phoebe, Rainbow - Roman Blind
products.description: Once the phoebe rainbow is on display, there's no missing it. A contemporary and somewhat abstract floral pattern displays rose pinks, sunshine yellows, and citrus oranges, as well as apple greens and petrol blues, forming a plethora of colour across the canvas. Use the rainbow in any room where you want to make a statement. A room with plenty of sunlight will complement this blind best, and surround it with similar sunny yellow and oranges for a cheery, uplifting look.

products.title: Rainforest Rainbow Roman Blind
products.description: Colour is the hallmark of clarissa hulse's work and it doesn't get much more colourful than this vibrant rainforest rainbow roman blind design. Inspired by costa rican cloud forests the tropical ferns are picked out in a multititude of bright hues. This blind will make a spectacu colour is the hallmark of clarissa hulse's work and it doesn't get much more colourful than this vibrant rainforest rainbow roman blind design.

products.title: Harper, Rainbow - Roman Blind
products.description: With a rainbow of colour and an explosion of shades that give this offering from the harper range its name you'll be able to add something enticing and eclectic to your interior. The real depth stems from the intriguing contrast between the zesty oranges and calmer pinks. A light blue feature wall and a light brown laminate floor are great ways to introduce this symphony of colour into the living room.
